data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Of Voltas Limited Held On 29Th January 2026
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its Meeting held today i.e. 29th January 2026 has approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025. The signed Financial Results along with the Limited Review Reports issued by the Statutory Auditors are enclosed. A copy of the Press Release is also enclosed. The above information will also be made available on the website of the Company at www.seshaasai.com

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration Of Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31 2025
data.news_body: Seshaasai Technologies Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 29/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve in compliance with Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we inform that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Thursday January 29 2026 to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31 2025. As informed earlier Trading Window for trading in the Companys equity shares was closed from January 01 2026 and shall open 48 hours after the aforesaid financial results are declared to Stock Exchanges

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Meeting For Consideration Of Unaudited Financial Results Along With Limited Review Report/AuditorS Report For The Quarter Ended June 30 2025
data.news_body:
Seshaasai Technologies Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 16/10/2025 inter alia to consider and approve In compliance with Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we inform that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Thursday October 16 2025 to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company (Standalone and Consolidated) along with Limited review report/Auditors report for the quarter ended June 30 2025.

As informed earlier Trading Window for trading in the Companys equity shares has been closed with effect from Tuesday October 01 2025 and shall open 48 hours after the financial results for the quarter ended September 30 2025 are declared to Stock Exchanges.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Seshaasai Technologies Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 30 2025 the equity shares of Seshaasai Technologies Ltd (Scrip Code: 544533) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of MT Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250929- dated September 29 2025.
